mapper.select: select violation_no as violationNo, user_no as userNo, report_status as reportStatus item, date, time, car_Num as carNum, spot, address, contents, video_url as videoUrl, report_status as reportStatus from violation where violation_no=#{violationNo} AND user_no=#{userNo}

select violation_no as violationNo, user_no as userNo, item, date, time, car_num as carNum, spot, address, contents, video_url as videoUrl, report_status as reportStatus from violation where user_no=#{userNo}
mapper.insert: insert into violation(user_no, item, date, time, car_num, spot, address, contents, video_url, report_status, lat, lng) values(#{userNo}, #{item}, #{date}, #{time}, #{carNum}, #{spot}, #{address}, #{contents}, #{videoUrl}, #{reportStatus}, #{lat}, #{lng})
mapper.delete: delete from violation where violation_no=#{violationNo} and user_no=#{userNo}
